name: Penguins (VulcanStorm)
description:
Race penguins down procedurally generated icebergs and be the first one to dive into the ocean!

Currently in early prototype stages for testing :)

Developed live on twitch! https://www.twitch.tv/vulcanstorm_

Join the discord to keep up with development! https://discord.gg/Z7x4hz25dx

Game files temporarily hidden until the next playtest!
